alert.note: Alert for Gray; Roberts (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 22 at 3:15PM CDT until May 22 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Gray County in the Panhandle of Texas... Southern Roberts County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 315 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northwest of Lake Mcclellan, or 14 miles south of Pampa, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Pampa, Miami, Mclean, Lefors, Lake Mcclellan, Lora, Kingsmill, Alanreed and Codman. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
